java.lang.Object

Direct Known Subclasses:

    • withNextRUNumber

      public B withNextRUNumber()
      Set the risk unit number to the next available risk unit number for this risk unit type on the policy. This relies on onPolicy being called before this method is called. Has no effect if the risk unit number has already been set.
      Returns:
      the modified builder
